links.*: Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien
The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide

wikitext.*:
On [[1 February]] [[1962]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien|a letter]] to [[Cor Blok]]'''.<ref>{{CG|C}}, p. 587</ref>

*'''Contents:''' The letter is a reply from Tolkien, concerning an exhibition. Tolkien also asks if he may buy two pieces of artwork from Blok.
*'''Publication:''' In [[2011]], a facsimile of the letter appeared in ''[[A Tolkien Tapestry]]'' (page [6]).
{{references}}
